thread.title: Alexandre Pinho

author: Alexandre Pinho
title: Alexandre Pinho
text:
Despite being the conditions advertised, they don't process the not used fuel. In my case occurred every time (twice), 3/4 of the fuel (more than 50â‚¬).
When trying to contact the client Support, the site doesn't link to the reservation, and doesn't accept the creation of an occurrence.
Goldcar answer here is unfortunately deceiving... never asked for diesel and confirms that no refund on the fuel was processed as should have been in the flex-fuel policy...
Great!
